text: Henry Tureman Allen Jr. was an equestrian from USA. Henry competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics. He was born on 11 August 1889 and died on 21 December 1971.Henry Allen == References == == Other websites == * Category:1889 births Category:1971 deaths Category:American equestrians Category:Olympians for the United States Category:People from West Point, New York Category:American show jumping riders Category:Sportspeople from New York (state) Category:Olympic equestrians for the United States
title: Henry Allen
